examples: Activities range from trapeze and freefall to archery and motorsports.
What's your favorite evening activity?
The whole house was a hive of activity on the day before the wedding.
There's a lot of police activity around here lately.
Italy's Mediterranean climate and diverse geography offer a wide range of outdoor activities
words.defineEn: something that a person spends time doing, particularly to accomplish a certain purpose
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó mà một người dành thời gian làm, đặc biệt là để hoàn thành một mục đích nhất định

examples: I planned a surprise party for my little sister's birthday.
She planned a romantic candlelit meal for their anniversary.
They are planning a movie night at the movie theater with their family.
The plan ran into a brick wall.
The closing of the airport knocked our holiday plans on the head.
words.defineEn: a chain of actions that will help us reach our goals
words.defineVi: một chuỗi các hành động sẽ giúp chúng tôi đạt được mục tiêu của mình

examples: Bad weather brought chaos to the utility companies.
The weather was disagreeably hot.
The weather turned quite chilly in the afternoon.
The bad weather brought famine.
Good afternoon, the weather is perfect for a walk.
words.defineEn: the temperature and other atmospheric conditions such as sunshine, rain, wind, etc.
words.defineVi: nhiệt độ và các điều kiện khí quyển khác như nắng, mưa, gió, v.v.

examples: The flowers bloomed under the sunny sky.
We often have a picnic in the park on sunny Sundays.
The sunny weather melted the snow, revealing patches of green grass.
He flew a kite in the park on a sunny day.
The sunny day encouraged us to go for a bike ride.
words.defineEn: very bright because there is a lot of light coming from the sun
words.defineVi: rất sáng vì có rất nhiều ánh sáng từ mặt trời

examples: The cloudy sky created a dramatic backdrop for the sunset.
The weather forecast predicted a cloudy morning followed by clearing in the afternoon.
I carried an umbrella with me because the weather looked cloudy.
We decided to postpone our outdoor plans due to the cloudy weather.
I couldn't see any stars because it was too cloudy at night.
words.defineEn: having many clouds up in the sky
words.defineVi: có nhiều đám mây trên bầu trời

examples: It's windy!
It was windy.
it's not windy?
They put hundreds of wind machines in windy places.
And it may be windy.
words.defineEn: with a lot of winds or exposed to winds
words.defineVi: với rất nhiều gió hoặc tiếp xúc với gió

examples: She found comfort in a warm bowl of creamy leek and potato soup on a rainy afternoon.
The rainy afternoon was perfect for staying in and reading a book.
I stayed indoors because it was a rainy day.
You may be disappointed when a rainy day puts the kibosh on your picnic plans.
I like to listen to the sound of raindrops falling on the roof during a rainy day.
words.defineEn: having or bringing a lot of rain
words.defineVi: có hoặc mang lại rất nhiều mưa

examples: The snowy landscape looked magical under the moonlight.
I took beautiful pictures of the snowy scenery during our winter hike.
We went skiing in the snowy mountains.
I wore warm boots to trudge through the snowy streets.
I put on my boots to go for a walk in the snowy park.
words.defineEn: ‌(of a period of time or weather) having or bringing snow
words.defineVi: ‌(của một khoảng thời gian hoặc thời tiết) có hoặc mang theo tuyết

examples: The weather was disagreeably hot.
The news came hot on the heels of another plane crash.
The factory closure follows hot on the heels of several others
The winter issue is hot off the press.
That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
words.defineEn: having a high temperature or a high degree of heat
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ cao hoặc nhiệt độ cao

examples: He feels the cold a lot.
The film caught a cold over the outstanding debt.
Sarah’s got a cold.
On the day of the wedding, Brown experienced cold feet.
He's out cold and as still as a stone.
words.defineEn: having a temperature lower than the human body's average temperature
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ thấp hơn nhiệt độ trung bình của cơ thể con người

examples: The water feels warm.
Are you warm enough?
It's quite warm outside.
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow on the buildings and trees.
The season of summer brings warm weather and longer days.
words.defineEn: having a temperature that is high but not hot, especially in a way that is enjoyable and pleasant
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ cao nhưng không nóng, đặc biệt là theo cách thú vị và dễ chịu

examples: The open window let in a cool breeze.
I dipped my feet in the cool water of the river.
I'd give my right arm for a nice cool drink.
She pressed her cheek against the cool glass window.
He completely lost his cool and started yelling.
words.defineEn: having a temperature that is low but not cold, especially in a way that is enjoyable and pleasant
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ thấp nhưng không lạnh, đặc biệt là theo cách thú vị và dễ chịu
